comment: She is such a sweet and understanding person. She really cares about her students! She is very educated and knows what she is teaching from experience. The course is very do-able if you just apply yourself and read the chapters before the quizzes. Be sure to use APA citation! You will love her! She counts off for being late though.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Fabulous! So kind and flexible with dates ! Took her for 4409 and learned so much, fair grader-good feedback. Take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Great Teacher, very knowledgable. She is very hands-on. She works well with you, but you should go to class. Lots of manipulatives to learn about and use in your lesson.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
